welcome_message_body: Welcome to Augusta, where Southern charm meets historic beauty. Known for its rich history, beautiful gardens, and vibrant arts scene, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer.

restaurants.name: Subway
restaurants.description: Subway is a sandwich spot located in Augusta.

restaurants.description: Sugar Shane's Café is a american restaurant located in Augusta.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bush Field Airport serves all commercial flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Bush Field Airport serves private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Daniel Field Airport houses all check-in counters, security checkpoints, and boarding gates.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Daniel Field Airport serves private and charter flights, providing a comfortable and efficient experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport serves all domestic flights.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at Municipal Airport serves all international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
